00020 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_LIGHTSUM_H_PLOKIJ
00021 #define CONSTRAINT_LIGHTSUM_H_PLOKIJ
00022 
00023 // This implementation of sum is designed for very short arrays, by
00024 // not keeping any state.
00025 
00027 template<typename VarRef, std::size_t size, typename VarSum, BOOL is_reversed = false>
00028 struct LightLessEqualSumConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00029 {
00030   virtual string constraint_name()
00031   { return "Light<=Sum"; }
00032   
00033   bool no_negatives;
00034   
00035   array<VarRef, size> var_array;  
00036   VarSum var_sum;
00037   LightLessEqualSumConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, const array<VarRef, size>& _var_array, const VarSum& _var_sum) :
00038     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var_array(_var_array), var_sum(_var_sum)
00039   {
00040     no_negatives = true;
00041     for(int i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00042     {
00043       if(var_array[i].getInitialMin() < 0)
00044       {
00045         no_negatives = false;
00046         return;
00047       }
00048     }
00049   }
00050   
00051   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal()
00052   {
00053     triggerCollection t;
00054     
00055     int array_size = var_array.size();
00056     for(int i = 0; i < array_size; ++i)
00057     { t.push_back(make_trigger(var_array[i], Trigger(this, i), LowerBound)); }
00058     
00059     t.push_back(make_trigger(var_sum, Trigger(this, -1), UpperBound));
00060     return t;    
00061   }
00062   
00063   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00064   {
00065     int sum_value = 0;
00066     int v_size = var_array.size();
00067     
00068     if(no_negatives)
00069     {
00070       int max_sum = var_sum.getMax();
00071       assignment.push_back(make_pair(v_size, max_sum));
00072       for(int i = 0; i < v_size && sum_value <= max_sum; ++i)
00073       {
00074         int min_val = var_array[i].getMin();
00075         assignment.push_back(make_pair(i, min_val));
00076         sum_value += min_val;
00077       }
00078       return (sum_value <= max_sum);
00079     }
00080     else
00081     {
00082       for(int i = 0; i < v_size; ++i)
00083       {
00084         assignment.push_back(make_pair(i, var_array[i].getMin()));
00085         sum_value += var_array[i].getMin();
00086       }
00087       if(sum_value > var_sum.getMax())
00088         return false;
00089       else
00090         assignment.push_back(make_pair(v_size, var_sum.getMax()));
00091       return true;
00092     }
00093   }
00094   
00095   
00096   virtual void propagate(int prop_val, DomainDelta)
00097   {
00098     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(LightSum);
00099     DomainInt min_sum = 0;
00100     for(unsigned i = 0; i < size; ++i)
00101       min_sum += var_array[i].getMin();
00102     
00103     if(prop_val >= 0)
00104     { var_sum.setMin(min_sum); }
00105     
00106     DomainInt slack = var_sum.getMax() - min_sum;
00107     for(unsigned i = 0; i < size; ++i)
00108       var_array[i].setMax(var_array[i].getMin() + slack);
00109   }
00110   
00111   virtual BOOL full_check_unsat()
00112   { return check_unsat(0, 0); }
00113   
00114   virtual BOOL check_unsat(int, DomainDelta)
00115   {
00116     DomainInt min_sum = 0;
00117     for(unsigned i = 0; i < size; ++i)
00118       min_sum += var_array[i].getMin();
00119     return min_sum > var_sum.getMax();
00120   }
00121   
00122   virtual void full_propagate()
00123   {
00124     propagate(-1,0);
00125     propagate(0,0);
00126   }
00127   
00128   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00129   {
00130     D_ASSERT(v_size == var_array.size() + 1);
00131     DomainInt sum = 0;
00132     for(int i = 0; i < v_size - 1; i++)
00133       sum += v[i];
00134     return sum <= *(v + v_size - 1);
00135   }
00136   
00137   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00138   { 
00139     vector<AnyVarRef> array_copy;
00140     array_copy.reserve(var_array.size() + 1);
00141     for(unsigned i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00142       array_copy.push_back(var_array[i]);
00143     array_copy.push_back(var_sum);
00144     return array_copy;
00145   }
00146 
00147   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00148   { return rev_implement<is_reversed>(); }
00149 
00150  template<bool b> 
00151   typename disable_if_c<b, AbstractConstraint*>::type rev_implement()
00152   {
00153      typedef array<typename NegType<VarRef>::type, size> VarArray;
00154       VarArray new_var_array;
00155       for(unsigned i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00156         new_var_array[i] = VarNegRef(var_array[i]);
00157       
00158       typedef typename ShiftType<typename NegType<VarSum>::type, compiletime_val<-1> >::type SumType;
00159       SumType new_sum = ShiftVarRef(VarNegRef(var_sum), compiletime_val<-1>());
00160       
00161       return new LightLessEqualSumConstraint<typename NegType<VarRef>::type, size, SumType, true>
00162         (stateObj, new_var_array, new_sum);
00163   }
00164 
00165   template<bool b>
00166   typename enable_if_c<b, AbstractConstraint*>::type rev_implement()
00167     { FAIL_EXIT(); }
00168 
00169 };
00170 
00171 template<typename VarRef, std::size_t size, typename VarSum>
00172 AbstractConstraint*
00173 LightLessEqualSumCon(StateObj* stateObj, const array<VarRef,size>& _var_array,  const VarSum& _var_sum)
00174 { 
00175   return (new LightLessEqualSumConstraint<VarRef, size, VarSum>(stateObj, _var_array,_var_sum)); 
00176 }
00177 
00178 
00179 template<typename VarRef, std::size_t size, typename VarSum>
00180 AbstractConstraint*
00181 LightGreaterEqualSumCon(StateObj* stateObj, const array<VarRef,size>& _var_array, const VarSum& _var_sum)
00182 { 
00183   return 
00184   (new LightLessEqualSumConstraint<typename NegType<VarRef>::type, size, 
00185    typename NegType<VarSum>::type>(stateObj, VarNegRef(_var_array), VarNegRef(_var_sum))); 
00186 }

00188 #endif
